sect2.title: Installation of freetype2
sect2.para: Install freetype2 by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: cp include/freetype/config/ftoption.h include/freetype/config/ftoption.h.orig && sed -e 's:/\* #define TT_CONFIG_OPTION_BYTECODE_INTERPRETER \*/:#define TT_CONFIG_OPTION_BYTECODE_INTERPRETER:' \ -e 's:/\* #define FT_CONFIG_OPTION_SYSTEM_ZLIB \*/:#define FT_CONFIG_OPTION_SYSTEM_ZLIB:' \ include/freetype/config/ftoption.h.orig > include/freetype/config/ftoption.h && ./configure --prefix=/usr && make && make install

note.para: The make install process does not uninstall older versions of freetype2. If installing an upgrade, you may want to remove the older libfreetype.so.x.x.x.
